Package net.rt5phantom.voidheart.config

Class PluginConfiguration

java.lang.Object
net.rt5phantom.voidheart.config.PluginConfiguration
public class PluginConfiguration extends Object
An object that allows a plugin developer to store and read their plugin's configuration settings.
Since:
v2.0.0
Author:
RT5Phantom

    • addOption

      public void addOption(String optionName, String value) throws AlreadyExistingOptionException
      Adds a new option to the instance.
      Parameters:
      optionName - The name of the new option.
      value - The value of the new option.
      Throws:
      AlreadyExistingOptionException - Thrown when trying to add a duplicate-named option.

    • removeOption

      public void removeOption(String optionName) throws OptionDoesNotExistException
      Removes an option from the instance.
      Parameters:
      optionName - The option to remove.
      Throws:
      OptionDoesNotExistException - Thrown when trying to remove an option that does not exist.

    • searchOption

      public Boolean searchOption(String optionName)
      Searches for an option by name from the instance.
      Parameters:
      optionName - The name of the option to search.
      Returns:
      Returns whether an option was found.

    • getOptionObject

      public ConfigOption getOptionObject(String optionName) throws OptionDoesNotExistException
      Gets an ConfigOption from the current instance based upon an option's name.
      Parameters:
      optionName - The name of the option to return.
      Returns:
      Returns the found ConfigOption object.
      Throws:
      OptionDoesNotExistException - Thrown when trying to get an option that does not exist.

    • getOptionValue

      public String getOptionValue(String optionName) throws OptionDoesNotExistException
      Gets the value from the current instance based upon an option's name.
      Parameters:
      optionName - The name of the option to find the value.
      Returns:
      Returns the value of the option.
      Throws:
      OptionDoesNotExistException - Thrown when trying to get an option that does not exist.

    • getAllOptions

      public ArrayList<ConfigOption> getAllOptions()
      Gets all options from the current instance.
      Returns:
      Returns options in the form of an ArrayList of ConfigOption objects.

    • searchOptionsReturnPlace

      private int searchOptionsReturnPlace(String optionName)
      Searches for an option by name and returns its place.
      Parameters:
      optionName - The name of the option to search.
      Returns:
      Returns the place of the option in list. Will return -1 if nothing is found.
